#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

int scanint()
{
int x=0;
register int c = getchar_unlocked();
for(;(c<48);c = getchar_unlocked());
for(;c>47;c = getchar_unlocked()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c -48;}
return x;
}

int main()
{
int t,n;
t=scanint();
while(t--)
{
n=scanint();
printf("%d\n",(int)sqrt(n));
}
return 0;
}
